alert.note: Alert for Central Greenville; Laurens; Southern Greenville (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 5:10PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Laurens, east central Greenville and southern Spartanburg Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 510 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles southwest of Spartanburg, or near Reidville, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Spartanburg, Greenville Downtown, Greenville Eastside, Mauldin, Simpsonville, Five Forks, Fountain Inn, Woodruff, Duncan and Lyman. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
